contextId.occurrenceNote: People saw patterns in the stars in the sky and gave names to them. These are two of those patterns. Alternate translation: "the stars" or "the groups of stars" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/translate-unknown]])
a white substance made from the teeth and horns of large animals (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/translate-unknown]])
Sycamores are broad trees that grow up to 15 meters tall. Alternate translation: "fig trees" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/translate-unknown]])
